title.rendered: Air Tahiti Airline in French Polynesia, France

content.rendered:
Air Tahiti is a French airline company which operates in French Polynesia, France. Its main hub is Faa’a International Airport. Far from the continents, Polynesia was late in developing air routes. The opening of Tahiti Faa’a International Airport, in 1960, meant that Tahiti could now receive international commercial flights. Four runways were built in the 1960s, and 27 in the following decade.

Air Tahiti Airline in French Polynesia, France Contact Address, Phone and Website

Air Tahiti Airline Address: Tahiti, French Polynesia, France

Online booking: +689 40 86 42 42

Email: NA

Air Tahiti Airline Official website: www.airtahiti.com/en/

Air Tahiti Airline Online Check-in: www.airtahiti.com/en/check-in

Note: Online check-in is available 30 hours to 1 hour prior to scheduled time of departure.

Check Air Tahiti Airline schedule here: www.airtahiti.com/en/flights-schedules

Air Tahiti Airline Baggage Allowance

View Air Tahiti Airline Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Travelling while pregnant in Air Tahiti Airline

Pregnancy rules in Air Tahiti Airline:

  • Upto 32 weeks pregnant women must submit a medical certificate to Air.

For more details visit: https://www.airtahiti.com/en/pregnancy

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Air Tahiti Airline

Total fleet: 14

  • ATR 42-600
  • ATR 72-600
  • Beechcraft King Air B200
  • de Havilland Canada DHC-6 Twin Otter (DHC-6-300)

Queries handled by Air Tahiti Airline Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Tahiti Airline in French Polynesia, France Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Tahiti Airline in French Polynesia, France: (click on the stars below)
